snippet: The American middleweight Claressa Shields, a teenager from Flint, Mich., won an Olympic gold medal in women’s boxing.
abstract: American middleweight Claressa Shields, a teenager from Flint, Mich., wins an Olympic gold medal in women’s boxing.
lead_paragraph: The American middleweight Claressa Shields, a teenager from Flint, Mich., won an Olympic gold medal in women’s boxing.

headline.seo: With Style, American Teenager Shields Wins Gold in Olympic Boxing
headline.main: Tongue Wagging, American Middleweight Wins Gold
